TutorialStart: ^Oh.. How did you get in here? I thought I was locked inside?
^Yes, I moved those stones blocking your door. Why were you crying?

c-0: ^Why? Look around! This place looks horrible! I need some color in here or else I'm gonna go crazy!
^Can't do anything about that, I'm sorry.

DidHelp: ^That sounds great! I think you should maybe try the garden by the pond, if you want to get me some new things. Strange.. I've never been out there but somehow I recall there being a workbench..
^You know, I was going to go out there and do it myself but I almost killed myself again trying to swing that thing hahahahahahaHAHAHAHAHAHA
IsHelping: ^The Garden I was talking about is just outside of the house and to the left. You can't miss it.
RoomNotRepaired: ^Are you going to be done soon?
RoomRepaired: ^I can finally be myself again.. No more sulking in bitterness!
Over: ^This feels great, thank you so much!
